insert.Script: UPDATE Tasks SET Completed = GETDATE() WHERE TaskID = @TaskID

update.FilterExpression: Completed is null AND (Owner = @BusinessRules_UserName OR Creator = @BusinessRules_UserName)

insert.Script: IF @Price IS NULL OR @Quantity IS NULL SET @TotalPrice = 0 ELSE SET @TotalPrice = @Price * @Quantity

update.Script: SET @Creator = @BusinessRules_UserName SET @Status = 'New' IF (@Owner IS NULL) SET @Owner = @BusinessRules_UserName ELSE SET @Status = 'Delegated'
SET @Creator = @BusinessRules_UserName SET @Status = 'New' IF (@Owner IS NULL) SET @Owner = @BusinessRules_UserName ELSE SET @Status = 'Delegated'
UPDATE Tasks SET Completed = GETDATE(), "Status" = 'Completed' WHERE TaskID = @TaskID

update.StatusBar:
Status: New [New] > In-Progress > Done >
Status: Delegated New > [Delegated] > In Progress > Completed >
Status: In-Progress New > [Being Worked On] > Completed >
Status: Canceled Something Went Wrong > [Canceled] >
Status: Completed New > In-Progress > [Completed] >

update.BlobAdapterConfig: Field: Attachment Storage-System: File Path-Template: C:\ToDo2\Attachments\{AttachmentID}-{FileName} File-Name-Field: FileName Content-Type-Field: ContentType Length-Field: Length

insert.Script: UPDATE aspnet_Membership SET Comment = 'EULAccepted' WHERE UserID = @UserID

update.Script: UPDATE aspnet_Membership SET Comment = 'EULAccepted' WHERE UserID = @UserID
UPDATE Users SET EulaAcceptedOn = GETDATE() WHERE UserName = @UserName
UPDATE Users SET EulaAcceptedOn = GETDATE() WHERE UserName = @UserName

update.StatusBar:
Status: New [New] > In-Progress > Done >
Status: Delegated New > [Delegated] > In Progress > Completed >
Status: In-Progress New > [Being Worked On] > Completed >
Status: Canceled Something Went Wrong > [Canceled] >
Status: Completed New > In-Progress > [Completed] >
